title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 176.1 - Purposes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 176.1 - Purposes

State Regulations

The purposes of this Part are: (a) to protect the interests of the life insurance-buying public by establishing limitations on the concentration of medium grade and lower grade obligations in which a domestic life insurer can invest; and
(b) to implement the Insurance Law of New York by regulating the acts and practices of domestic life insurers with respect to the concentration of investments in medium grade and lower grade obligations. Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
